Camera

Contains logic to support usage of the Keyence Camera

Functions
SelectProgram
call Camera.SelectProgram(
programIndex,
&responseCode
)

Select the desired program on the camera controller Parameters: programIndex - the program to select

Response Parameters
&responseCode

the success of the operation

RunProgram
call Camera.RunProgram(
&responseCode
)

Run the selected program

Response Parameters
&responseCode

the success of the operation

SelectAndRunProgram
call Camera.SelectAndRunProgram(
programIndex,
&responseCode
)

Select the desired program, then run it

See Also

  • Camera.SelectProgram

  • Camera.RunProgram

Parameters
programIndex

the desired program

Response Parameters
&responseCode

the result of the operation

GetProgramData
call Camera.GetProgramData(
index,
&value
)

Retrieve camera result data at the specified index

Parameters
index

the result index

Response Parameters
&value

the value stored in the given index
